title: Top Places to visit in Piler, Andhra Pradesh
content: Pileru is a census town in Chittoor district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the mandal headquarters of Pileru mandal in Madanapalle revenue division  It passes through a river and hence it got the name Pileru. title: Top Places to visit in Dhone, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Dhone or Dronachalam is a town in Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a Municipality located in Dhone Mandal.

title: Top Places to visit in Yerraguntla, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Yerraguntla is a Leading Industrial town in Kadapa district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yerraguntla Mandal of Kadapa revenue division.
Geography
Yerraguntla is located at 14.6333°N 78.5333°E. It has an average elevation of 152 meters (501 feet).

title: Top Places to visit in Yemmiganur, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Yemmiganur is a town in the Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is located in Yemmiganur Mandal of the Adoni revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Vinukonda, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Vinukonda is a town in the Guntur district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and the headquarters of Vinukonda Mandal and administered under the Narasaraopet revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Venkatagiri, Andhra Pradesh
content: Venkatagiri is a town in Nellore district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a municipality and mandals headquarters of Venkatagiri Mandal. Venkatagiri's old name is "Kali Mili". Top Places to visit in Tuni, Andhra Pradesh
content: Tuni is a town in East Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a major commercial marketing center for more than 40 surrounding villages in the district. title: Top Places to visit in Tiruvuru, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Tiruvuru is a town in Krishna district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is a nagar panchayat in Tiruvuru mandal of Nuzvid revenue division.

title: Top Places to visit in Tanuku, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Tanuku is a town in West Godavari district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Tanuku Mandal in the Kovvur revenue division. Tanuku is the Fifth largest town in the West Godavari district after Eluru, Bhimavaram, Tadepalligudem, and Palakollu.

title: Top Places to visit in Sullurpeta, Andhra Pradesh
content:
Sullurupeta is a town in the Nellore district of Andhra Pradesh, India. It is a municipality and also the Mandal headquarters of Sullurpeta Mandal. It serves as a gateway to Satish Dhawan Space Centre at Sriharikota.

title: Top Places to visit in Srisailam (RFC) Township, Andhra Pradesh
content: Srisailam is a census town in Kurnool district of the Indian state of Andhra Pradesh. It is the Mandal headquarters of Srisailam Mandal in Kurnool revenue division.
